system.description: You place another spell upon your person so that it takes effect under a condition you dictate when casting contingency. Both spells are cast at the same time (minimum 10 minutes total, or the companion spell's casting time if longer). The companion spell must affect your person and be of a level no higher than one-third your caster level (rounded down, max 6th). When the prescribed circumstances occur, the companion spell is brought into effect instantaneously. You can have only one contingency at a time.

components.materialDescription: That of the companion spell, plus quicksilver and an eyelash of an ogre mage, rakshasa, or similar spell-using creature. Focus: statuette of you carved from elephant ivory and decorated with gems (worth at least 1,500 gp); you must carry it.
